name: Sweet and Tart Yellow Tomatoes
recipeCategory: easy, quick, weekday, salads and dressings
keywords: champagne vinegar, cherry tomatoes, sugar, low-fat, low-sodium, side dish, summer
recipeIngredient: 8 large yellow cherry tomatoes or 12 small ones
1 tablespoon champagne vinegar or other white wine vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: Mix vinegar with sugar in serving dish. Add tomatoes and toss.
